description: Resolve a logical folder path within a Jira/Xray project test repository and return the corresponding folder identifier.

path.description: Hierarchical folder path to resolve within the project's test repository (e.g. "Root/Backend/Login").

project.description: The Jira project key in which the folder path should be resolved (e.g. PROJECT).

name: resolve_xray_folder_path

id.description: Resolved internal identifier of the folder.

path.description: Normalized folder path that was resolved.
